entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of wet flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of wet flurries early this afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:07 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:07 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:07 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
